Detailed Description

Listener for navigation call backs. The abstract functions are the callback functions that is called for the respective asynchronous function call in NavigationInterface.

This listener makes it possible to make a navigation user interface that is constantly updated as the position is updated.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void WFAPI::NavigationInfoUpdateListener::distanceUpdate ( const UpdateNavigationDistanceInfo &  info  )  [pure virtual]

Called any number of times between infoUpdate calls. A distanceUpdate call is an information update of the last infoUpdate call.

Parameters:
info The information update.

virtual void WFAPI::NavigationInfoUpdateListener::infoUpdate ( const UpdateNavigationInfo &  info  )  [pure virtual]

Called when changing from one turn to the next.

Parameters:
info The information of the upcoming turn.

virtual void WFAPI::NavigationInfoUpdateListener::playSound (  )  [pure virtual]

Play the sounds from the last prepareSound call. When the sounds has been played call soundPlayed in the NavigationInterface.

virtual void WFAPI::NavigationInfoUpdateListener::prepareSound ( const WFStringArray &  soundNames  )  [pure virtual]

List of names of sound files to be played at the next playSound call. Load the sound files from the sound clips directory. When the sounds has been loaded call soundPrepared in the NavigationInterface.

Parameters:
soundNames The sound files names.
